<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Skartitch Chip-Tooth](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1718)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +28; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94), [Shobhad](/Languages.aspx?ID=97)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +29, [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +31, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +29

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67)_ (10 bolts), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, _[disintegration bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=161)_ (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 290

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirement** Skartitch can't use this reaction while [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12); **Trigger** Skartitch is hit or critically hit by an attack made by a creature she can see; **Effect** Skartitch gains a +2 circumstance bonus to her Armor Class against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_fangs_ +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 2d6+13 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 3d8+8 piercing

**Cunning Discernment** <actions string="Single Action" />  Skartitch attempts a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) check against an opponent using the [standard DC for a creature of that level](/Rules.aspx?ID=554). On a success, that opponent is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against Skartitch's attacks until the start of her next turn; on a critical success, the opponent is flat-footed against Skartitch's attacks for 1 minute.

**Deadly Deception** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Skartitch attempts a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against an opponent she can see. On a success, Skartitch can immediately Strike with one [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack and one ranged weapon attack against the target. The ranged attack does not trigger reactions from the target of the Feint. Both of these attacks count toward her multiple attack penalty, but do not apply the penalty until both attacks are completed.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Skartitch deals an extra 4d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Skartitch Chip-Tooth
